A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have always loved Star Wars... but this is it\, just so comically bad. A nonsensical plot dragged out to 2 1/2 hours and filled with Disney smush and bad writing. Say what you want about the prequels but at least they were distinct\, original and told excellent stories. Gives me a headache thinking that Disney will be making these movies once a year until the end of time-- I want off this ride\, can we get George back please??!
